content.en: Optimizing batch plants: Researchers have been exploring how algorithms can optimize the design and scheduling of batch plants, which are used in chemical production. These algorithms, such as the αBB algorithm and mixed-integer linear programming, are employed to refine solutions, reduce computational time, and handle various features found in industrial environments. By using these algorithms, scientists aim to achieve optimal scheduling, minimize production time, and address uncertainties in the process.
content.da: Optimering af batch-anlæg: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan algoritmer kan optimere design og planlægning af batch-anlæg, som anvendes i kemisk produktion. Disse algoritmer, såsom αBB-algoritmen og mixed-integer lineær programmering, anvendes til at forfine løsninger, reducere beregningstid og håndtere forskellige egenskaber, der findes i industrielle miljøer. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer sigter forskerne efter at opnå optimal planlægning, minimere produktionstiden og imødegå usikkerheder i processen.
